name: Minda
description:
Minda is an online version of Abalone, the board game.

In Minda, not only you can play with the standard rule, but also you can play with customized rules like 3 seconds turn timeout, one marble life or both. Play Abalone that you haven't seen before.

You can speculate your friends playing Minda and talk with them through the in-game chat. Help them or interfere with them while they're playing.

Minda has an unique discord bot that supports battle notification, match making and history view. Introduce Minda to your discord community and boast about your intelligence.

The best feature of Minda is the marble skin. Upload any image you like and make it into a marble skin. It will be shown to other players.
